title: Screening of new movie starring JLaw to benefit Louisville school
text: LOUISVILLE, KY (WAVE) – A school for at risk children is set to benefit from a special screening of a new film starring Louisville's own Jennifer Lawrence. The Jennifer Lawrence Foundation and the Community Foundation of Louisville will host a screening of "American Hustle" on Monday, December 16 at Baxter Avenue Filmworks. Before the film attendees will enjoy a cocktail reception and silent auction beginning at 5:30 p.m. Proceeds from the event will benefit the West End School, a private K-8 school for at risk boys. To learn more about the screening or to purchase tickets, click here. Copyright 2013 WAVE 3 News. All rights reserved.
